decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning from 02.12.2022 . Reason: To comply with the requirements of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans listed in this notice unless where otherwise altered by a condition of this permission. Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The development shall be implemented in strict accordance with the brickwork details approved under ref 23/01794/DET on 31.07.2023.Reason: To preserve the special interest of the listed building and the character and appearance of the Conservation Area. (Policy Q20 and Q22 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

Prior to the commencement of the proposed development, full details of the proposed jib door including sections scaled at 1:10 shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The details shall include how the jib door sits within the masonry reveal is to be submitted. The development shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the approved details. Reason: To preserve the special interest of the listed building. (Policy Q20 andQ22 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021).

The development shall be implemented in strict accordance with the details of Plumbing and Drainage, approved under ref 23/01795/DET on 31.07.2023 unless the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority is obtained to any variation.Reason: To preserve the special interest of the listed building. (Policy Q20 and Q22 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021).
